text: Pavel Aleksandrovich Sudarikov (; born 24 October 1972 in Lyubertsy) is a former Russian football player. His older brother Aleksei Sudarikov also was a footballer. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:People from Lyubertsy Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC FShM Torpedo Moscow players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Asmaral Moscow players Category:FC Moscow players Category:Association football defenders
title: Pavel Sudarikov
